pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO (2010, TV show)$(br2)Used by $(l:ooo/riders/ooo)Kamen Rider OOO$(/l)$(br2)Can be changed between Machine Vendor Mode and Machine Bike Mode by right-clicking while sneaking$(br2)Gives a $(l:ooo/arsenal/candroids)Candroid$(/l) when right-clicked with a $(l:ooo/items/cellmedal)Cell Medal$(/l) while in Machine Vendor Mode
Right-click with a $(l:ooo/arsenal/candroids#tora_candroid)Tora Candroid$(/l) to convert into the $(l:ooo/arsenal/toridevendor)ToRidevendor$(/l)
